metadata.title: CVE-2021-3673 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in Radare2 in version 5.3.1. Improper inputvalidation when reading a crafted LE binary can lead to resource exhaustionand DoS.

criterions.comment: radare2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
